text.text_translated:
In 2010, a team at NASA found and made a list of big asteroids near Earth. They found 90 per cent of the very big ones. These asteroids are 1km wide.

Near-Earth objects are big rocks in space. They are near our planet, Earth. They are very big, like mountains. They are less than 50 million kilometres from Earth.

NASA knows about 887 of these big asteroids. They think there are about 50 more to find. NASA says none of these 887 asteroids are a big danger to our planet.
